Package gobblin.data.management.copy.replication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CopyRouteGenerator
    Used to indicate the interface for generating the CopyRoute based on ReplicationConfiguration in Pull mode, the copy to EndPoint in Push mode, the copy from EndPoint
    DataFlowTopologyPickerBySource
    Used to pick preferred DataFlowTopology in Config format
    EndPoint
    Used to encapsulate all the information of a replica, including original source, during replication process.
    EndPointFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigBasedCopyableDatasetFinder
    Based on the ConfigStore object to find all ConfigBasedMultiDatasets to replicate.
    ConfigBasedDataset
    Extends CopyableDataset to represent data replication dataset based on Config Detail logics Picked the preferred topology Based on current running cluster and CopyMode (push or pull) pick the routes Based on optimization policy to pick the CopyFrom and CopyTo pair Generated the CopyEntity based on CopyFrom and CopyTo pair
    ConfigBasedDatasetsFinder
    Based on the configuration store to find all ConfigBasedDataset
    ConfigBasedMultiDatasets
    Based on single dataset configuration in Config format, in Pull mode replication, there could be multiple ConfigBasedDataset generated.
    CopyRoute  
    CopyRouteGeneratorBase
    Basic implementation for picking a CopyRoute in Push mode
    CopyRouteGeneratorOptimizedLatency
    In Pull mode, Optimized for data replication latency: pick the highest watermark from all the data sources
    CopyRouteGeneratorOptimizedNetworkBandwidth
    In Pull mode, Optimized for network bandwidth : pick the first available data source
    CopyRouteGeneratorOptimizedNetworkBandwidthForTest
    This class is necessary for unit test purpose: - Mockito cannot mimic the situation where a file system contains a dataset path.
    CopyRouteGeneratorOptimizer
    Provide the basic optimizer implementation in pull mode.
    DataFlowTopology
    Class to represent the data flow topology from copy source to copy destinations.
    DataFlowTopology.DataFlowPath  
    DataFlowTopologyPickerByHadoopFsSource  
    HadoopFsEndPoint  
    HadoopFsEndPointDataset
    FileSystemDataset wrapper class for HadoopFsEndPoint
    HadoopFsEndPointFactory  
    HadoopFsReplicaConfig
    Used to encapsulate all the configuration for a hadoop file system replica
    ReplicaHadoopFsEndPoint  
    ReplicationConfiguration
    Class ReplicationConfiguration is used to describe the overall configuration of the replication flow for a dataset, including: Replication copy mode ReplicationCopyMode Meta data ReplicationMetaData Replication source EndPoint Replication replicas EndPoint Replication topology DataFlowTopology
    ReplicationDataValidPathPicker
    Used to pick the valid Paths for data replication based on Config
    ReplicationMetaData
    Class used to represent the meta data of the replication
    SourceHadoopFsEndPoint  
    WatermarkMetadataGenerationCommitStep
    A CommitStep to write watermark metadata to Hdfs
    WatermarkMetadataUtil
    Utility class to serialize and deserialize the Watermark
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ReplicationCopyMode
    Specify the replication copy mode, either Pull or Push
